product_name: Leki Easy Lock System Expanders - Pair
long_description: This pair of replacement expanders is for Leki(R) trekking poles and walking staffs that feature the Easy Lock adjustment system. Fits Leki Super Makalu, Ultralite Ti Air Ergo, Ultralite Core Tec, Wanderfreund staff and Sierra walking staff. Order 14mm for lower section, 16mm for center section and 18mm for upper section. Part of the Leki Trek-Tech accessory line.
short_description: This pair of replacement expanders is for Leki(R) trekking poles and walking staffs that feature the Easy Lock adjustment system.
